1221122.content:
You have to say, you don't much like the thought of pounding on Alina's toes, trying to get her attention. That's a recipe to be poked at and stepped on, you're just sure of it. But your other option is to climb her... And that still requires getting past her toes. You don't really like that either, but it sounds better than banging on them.

So carefully, you hoist yourself up onto the end of the flip-flop, looking at the toes. Each easily the size of you or a little bigger. You decide walking up the strap would be your best bet. Least chance to bug her and get crushed. So you skirt along the edge, not touching her in the process until you stand next to her big toe, looking up at the thin, black strap. Nothing in your life has ever been so foreboding.

But you steel yourself. This is your best option. And if you wait too long, class will end. And you really don't want to be here when she starts walking. So you take a careful step up the strap, going slowly to keep from losing your balance. Things go pretty well. It's not too hard after the initial step and you make quick progress.

But just as you reach the fork where the strap parts to the sides of the flip-flop, Alina pulls her foot out of the sandal reaching down to scratch an itch on her heel. But n doing so, she shakes the strap and you. You flail, trying to grab the strap and keep from falling off.

Do you manage to stay on?

“Crap!”

You shout as you fall off the strap, landing face-first on the soft foam and groaning. This is not what you wanted...

You struggle to roll over and sit up, feeling a headache coming on. You look up at Alina to see what she's doing and watch her scratch her foot, in a bit of a daze. It's only when she starts to move it back toward you that you snap out of it.

Immediately, you go into panic mode. You crawl to your feet, clutching your head as you try to steady yourself after that unexpected fall. She'll be on you in just a few seconds. You can climb back onto the sandal after she gets back into it. You turn to sprint off the end and smack directly into the strap. Turning around, you freeze in terror.

There's no time to run around it. Her toes slide in around you, squishing you between the strap and her foot. You're forced between her toes with no escape. And as she wiggles her foot to fit it over the strap, your face is pressed into her skin, taking in her scent, which isn't as bad as you might expect, but still isn't terribly pleasant.

But now you're trapped. And you're too scared to try to move to get out of here. The slightest annoyance could cause her to twitch and crush you to death. Right now, your fate is in the hands, or feet really, of Alina. And you really hope she gets another itch soon...

A few intense minutes of this later...

Just one more class until she was free for the day. Standing up, she slung the bag over her shoulder, yawned, and walked out into the crowded hallway.

About five feet below, you didn't have the luxury of boredom. As Alina stood, her foot pressed into strap of the sandal, and you were stuck between them, pressed face-first into her skin. You could only be glad she was wearing open sandals and you weren't trapped in some enclosed boot where just the smell would probably knock you out. But right now, you're not in the mood to celebrate small victories. With every step she takes, you're released just slightly. And when her foot hits the ground, you're slammed back into her.

You consider trying to crawl out from between her toes during these steps, but you're too worried about falling out in the crowded hallway and getting stepped on by someone else. For now, you can only hold on and try to keep from getting crushed by Alina. You just hope she gets to class soon and you can relax.

Unfortunately for you, Alina's in no hurry. But she's stopped somewhere in the hallway. Probably at her locker. You take advantage of this pause to catch your breath.

Alina opens the locker, swinging the door open and reaching for...

1221122222.content:
Alina grabbed her gym bag, eyeing the mess of a locker in case there were anything else she needed. She wasn't coming back before she left today. She shifted her weight to one foot, scratching the back of her leg with her other, then slipped it back into her sandal, slammed the locker shut, spun the lock and walked off toward the gym.

Unfortunately for you, the leg she scratched was the one attached to the foot currently smothering you and when she lifts her other leg, you're only squeezed harder between the sandal and her foot. When Alina finally stops scratching and starts walking, you discover to your horror that you're no longer freed from her with each step. You've become stuck to her skin and the sandal comes loose from you instead, slamming back into you and pushing you into her again and again each time her foot comes down. A tormenting walk later, you're no less stuck and you can barely see where you're arriving.

Alina walks into the locker room, dropping her bag on the bench and sitting next to it. She unzips it and pulls out a pair of clearly lightly-worn black sneakers, setting them next to her and rooting through the bag for more.

When Alina sits down, you breathe a sigh of relief. Finally, you can work on getting yourself out of this mess. That's when you swear you could hear a long zipper. You cock an eyebrow, trying to look up and failing extravagantly. A few seconds pass and you feel Alina drawing her foot out of her flip flop, taking you with it. You try to struggle but can barely move, pinned between her toes. You whip your head around, seeing now that you're in a locker room and realizing what must be coming. You jerk your head back and see a black sock approaching Alina's foot, crying out as it falls over you, sealing you in darkness.

Alina perks up, thinking she heard something as she was pulling on her sock. She stops for a moment, listening. But when she doesn't hear anything else, she goes back to dressing, pulling on her other sock and then changing into a pair of loose-fitting running pants for the sake of not having to wear shorts.

Your world is quickly heating up. In the sock, you're confined tightly to Alina now, and even if you were to escape from between her toes you'd be stuck in here. Not to mention in a moment, she's going to-

As if cutting you off, you feel you prison tighten up as Alina pulls on her sneakers, tying them tightly and tossing her bags in an empty locker before heading into the gym.

Now with each step, you're crushed between her toes and jostled a little, but there's no temporary freedom. And the temperature's rising in here. You're not sure if you can take an entire gym class like this.

The next time Alina stands still, you try to worm your way out of the first layer of prison between her toes, managing to move but not upward at all. In fact, you might have driven yourself a little deeper. You shout in frustration.

Above, Alina's feeling something stuck between her toes. Maybe a rock or something that somehow got into her sock? Whatever it was, it was going to drive her nuts. She...
1221122222.title: Gym Bag

choices: She's just walking. Back to the locker room?

12211222222.content:
If she went back to the locker room now, when she came back, it'd look like she was late. And the gym teachers had enough of a problem with Alina as it was. She decided to tough it out and try to work the thing out during class.

A minute later, Coach Bond came out of his office. "Alright, ladies and gentlemen. Time for warm-ups!"

Alina groaned, running her toes together, trying to work the rock out with little success. Her damned sneakers were too tight to let her move them around much.

Inside her sock, you were in hell. Every time Alina's toes slammed into each other trying to dislodge you, you were freed slightly, then slammed back down and crushed between them once more. There was no room in here for this, and Alina's feet were already beginning to sweat. Her big toe freed you once more, then slid down your front, coating you head to toe in her nasty foot sweat. Suddenly flip-flops were sounding a hell of a lot nicer.

While she stretched, Alina tried every possible movement and squirming of her toes to free you, each one only working to crush you and keep you firmly wedged. When she sat down to stretch, foot pointed toward the ceiling, her squirming let you drop flat onto the skin between her toes, getting a taste of her foot once more, trying to take a breath as you dropped. Despite both of you best efforts, you were as close to her as possible, and now coated in sweat, a mixture of Alina's and your own.

Above, your captor was finally finishing her warm-ups just in time for the coach to shout out that it was time to jog. She groaned, but didn't fight it, running around the gym with everyone else.

Each step felt like an elevator going 50 miles an hour to you. When her foot would rise, you'd slip out from between her toes a bit, then when it would hit the ground, you'd be slammed back down a little deeper than before. After several minutes of jogging, it was just your head pinned between her toes, the rest of you laying on the bottom of the shoe safe in the crevice between them. At this point, you didn't want to be freed. If you slipped out now, you'd get caught under her foot and probably be crushed on the spot. The thought sent a chill down your spine. At least Alina was standing still for a moment now. You desperately reached up, pulling yourself up away from her foot and managing to pop your head out from between her toes, shimmying toward the end of her sock as far from her as possible. "Finally!"

Just as you found your freedom, Alina noticed you were missing. She smiled. "Finally." She spread her toes as much as she could to enjoy the feeling of nothing trapped there. Unfortunately, she did so just as you were trying to stand and when she brought them back together, she did so right around you, pinning you once more. "Damn it..."

"Damn it!" You shouted, trying to shake yourself free with as much success as you had here before. You were tired, hot, soaked in sweat and just wanted out of this smelly prison. And she still had whatever the hell they were actually doing in gym before you could be freed.

This shoe was starting to feel like a sauna to you. So damned hot, so moist...no wonder Alina was wearing flip flops. You shuddered to think what it must be like in her usual boots. The price of fashion... You feel like you're about to pass out. In fact...everything is getting awfully fuzzy. You're at your limit. You just have to hope Alina doesn't crush you while you're out. Maybe you'll wake up after this awful class is finished...

And with that, you're out...

...

...

Some time later, you come to practically unmoved from your initial position to feel Alina moving. You try to get a feel for what's going on as you wake up.

You smell the dull aroma of her worn boots, but her feet is much stronger. With her feet warming up, they are becoming sweatier, and with that, you feel yourself loosening. 12211222222122.content:
You don't know how long Alina has been walking. It is difficult to have a sense of time in this darkness, along with all the constant stimuli hitting you, you have difficulty just thinking straight. The constant moving came to a halt. Alina must have stopped. This has given you the chance to move around without the danger of slipping under foot. The sweat she worked up also has allowed you to become unstuck, and slip out from between her toes. You manage to climb up to the top of her foot, albeit crawling in the small area between her foot and the top of the boot. It is pretty tight, but really, it is just nice to move around some. You stretch some, and attempt to relax as much as physically possible, when her foot stars to jostle around. Alina pulls her foot out, pulling you along with it, up until she gets to the tall part. With nothing to grip on to, you fall to the bottom of the boot as she is pulling out. You land face-first into the moist heel of her boot, and get a mouth-full of the sweat that had accumulated. 153.content:
Just as you think you're about to have a mental breakdown, everything changes back. You look at your hands, then the hall, making sure you're not having some horrid dream. You take a deep breath, wiping a bit of sweat from your forehead. Was that candy laced with something?

You shake your head, and make a mental note to give Ariel a piece of your mind the next time you see her. Looking at your watch, you curse. You're about to be late. That was the last thing you needed. Practically running, you get to the detention room just as the clock hits 3, panting as you walk to the back row of desks, collapsing in one in the middle of the row. Time to get this over with.

After a minute, you look around the room, curious who else is here. Looks like just two other people. Both girls. One of them has short black hair, and wears an army jacket and torn up jeans. Looks like she's maybe a grade above you, and a tomboy. She looks almost like the stereotype for the sort of person you'd see in here. From behind, at least.

The other girl is the complete opposite. Wavy brown hair falling to her shoulders, glasses visible on her face, and as she turns her head to look at the clock, a sad frown that says she probably deserved to be here as much as you did. She wore a brown jacket and jeans in good repair. Hanging next to her, draped over the desk and almost touching the floor, was an obnoxiously long, colorful scarf that you think you've seen on some British TV show flipping through channels and you know you've seen in the halls once or twice. Nerdy, but cute. She looked a grade above you too.

Sighing, you lean your head back against the wall and cross your arms. Hour of boredom here we come.

Suddenly the door flies open and your head jerks up to see who was here to win the most entertaining entrance award. In walked a girl probably a good half a foot taller than you, hair cut into a faded pink mohawk in need of redying, that fell to the left side of her head. She wore a white wife beater that revealed her bra straps and black pajama pants that seemed to hug her very apparent hips quite well. She was a senior. No doubt about it. She yawned and looked at the teacher sitting at the front desk.

The teacher just sighed, seemingly used to this. "Back again, Susan?"

"Yep. And it's still Susie." She looked over, seeming to be surveying the almost empty room. Her eyes lock onto you and she smiles. "You're new."

You're not sure what to say as she walks over to you, sitting down in the desk beside yours. You've definitely been to detention before, though not for a while. But at the moment, you can't seem to get up the gall to tell her that as you stare back into her piercing blue eyes.

"You're a quiet one, huh? I think I like you. What's your name?"

"Susan. Sit apart from everyone else. In the front row, if you would." The teacher cuts in before you can muster an answer.

"Aw...but I'm making friiieeends." Susan wraps her arms around you, hugging your head to her chest. You blush. She laughs. "Sorry, cutie. Maybe we can hang when we're done here." As she walks away, she sways her hips in a way you're not sure is her natural walk, and you have to admit have a hard time taking your eyes away from until she takes her seat.

Well, that was...interesting, to say the least. Maybe you will hang out after this is over. With a smile on your face, you set your head against the wall again, waiting impatiently but less annoyed than last time.

You feel yourself doze off for a minute, then you feel your back support vanish, and you jerk awake. When you open your eyes, the world has changed again. You're surrounded by massive desks. And...and you're sitting on one. And in the distance, you can see the three girls trapped in detention with you, and they're giant, and...oh god. The candy's hit again...

It'll fade...just relax. Things will change back. You think, closing your eyes and taking a deep breath. But a minute passes, and when you open your eyes, everything is still huge. Seems you're in this for the long haul. You gulp, terrified. You need to find some help. Preferably sooner rather than later... You walk to the edge of the seat, carefully lowering yourself to the leg and sliding to the ground. You've got until the last bell rings to get some help or you'll be trapped in here all night.

You don't think you'll have a shot at asking more than one of these girls to help for one reason or another. Who do you try to get to?
153.title: Wait, what?

choices: Hide in a jacket pocket
Continue climbing the tomboy
Approach her hand
1531.content:
Out of this cast of characters, the tomboy looked the most sane. The nerdy girl might use you for some sick science experiment, and you don’t even want to think about the ways in which Susie could take advantage of your size. You’d rather not ask her for help, only for her to pit you in a cage match against her pet scorpion. Hopefully the tomboy will be responsible enough to keep you safe. As she was seated next to the window, you make your way over to the wall first. Dozens of gum wrappers and dust bunnies the size of dump trucks litter the area under the radiator, making you wonder just how lazy your school’s janitors really were. After a long journey, you finally reach the tomboy’s chair. Her army jacket doesn’t reach down to the floor, so you’re forced to approach her hiking boots. They would look worn-out to any normal-sized person, but at your size, you can see every scrape and scuffle. Clods of dried mud suggest that she’s an outdoorsy type. A creaking sound from far above indicates that she’s mooching around in her seat, as anxious for this detention period to be over as you are to get help.

Hoping the girl won’t suddenly kick her foot out in frustration, you notice that the rubber sole of her boot would make a good platform for climbing onto the shoe, as the laces don’t reach far enough down to grab. Reaching up with both hands, you hoist yourself on the side of the boot. Pressing yourself up against the side of the boot makes it easier to sidle over the toe part, but also gets some of the dirt and mud on your clothes. The noticeably stiffer toe portion informs you that this is a steel-toe boot. It would certainly spell the end for you if you got kicked by that. As you climb onto the toe of the boot, you stand up and take a gander around. You can’t see much beyond the plateau of the girl’s knee, and the thickness of her boots and jeans means it would be hard to try and irritate her enough to notice you from here. You’ll have to get closer, and her thick bootlaces offer an easy way to clamber up. The crisscrossed laces make great hand and footholds, and you quickly make your way up to the cuff of her ripped jeans. The rough material of the jeans is easy to climb, but you have to avoid the tears in the material like potholes in the road. The rips provide glimpses of the tomboy’s toned legs, however. Her knees are completely bare, the material having been completely torn away, forcing you to venture onto her skin. You lay your hands on her warm skin and scramble over her knee as quickly as you can. As you crest the top of the knee, you gasp in fright as you see her hand directly in front of you! You crouch frozen in place, expecting her to grab you at any moment or scratch her knee and tear you to shreds. Thankfully, after a few tense moments you realize that her hand is merely resting on her thigh, the same thigh you’re currently on. Approaching the hand, your eyes follow from her unpainted fingernails to her knuckles, which were bruised and raw. It looks like she was in a fight and that’s what landed her in detention (this time). You hope you picked the right girl, but it’s too late to turn back now. Looking past her hand, you see her metal-studded belt holding up her pants and above it the bottom of a black shirt with an unidentifiable logo. Her army jacket is now close enough that you can make your way into one of its pockets so you can go home with this girl. However, given how still she’s been up to this point, she might be asleep at her desk, which would make climbing her upper body a bit easier, but her short-cropped hair would make it harder to reach her ear, if that’s your chosen way to be recognized. A third path would be to climb up the sleeve of her army jacket, but that would involve climbing onto her sore hand. Regardless of your path, detention must surely be ending soon, so you better make up your mind quickly.
1531.title: Tomboy Traversal

choices: You are stuck to the pocket
You are thrust into daylight, but stuck to her hand
15311.content:
The sanctuary of her jacket pocket is nearly within reach. A few links of the zipper are lying against the tomboy’s thigh, giving you something of a rope ladder that you can climb down towards her pocket. Sneaking around her hand, which is resting like a sleeping giant, you make it to the edge of the jacket. Each zipper link is the size of a basketball to your diminutive hands. The gaps between each link offer hand and footholds as you work your way down. Finally, you are parallel to the opening of the pocket. Grabbing fistfuls of the coarse material, you make your way hand-over-hand to your chosen shelter. This is way harder than climbing the rope in gym class! At least if you fell there, a mat would cushion the blow. Here, falling would mean certain doom, with the promise of a swift death under a tomboy’s boot if you survive the way down.

Gasping for breath, you finally pull yourself into the cavern of the girl’s pocket. You throw yourself hard into the interior, landing on a pile of discarded gum wrappers that crinkle under your weight. Light streams in through the opening of the pocket, making it seem like a cave made out of cloth. Sounds are a bit muffled through the material, but you can hear the scraping of chairs and a cacophony of voices, indicating that detention was finally over. You are unprepared, however, when your host stands up, and the sudden movement throws you around the pocket. You guess this is what your clothes must feel like when they are tumbling around in the dryer. Scooching on your butt towards the far end of the pocket, you brace yourself against the enclosing walls. The pocket sways back and forth as the tomboy gratefully exits the room.

The ride isn’t so bad, now that you’re getting used to it. You can only hope that the tomboy will go home straight after school, since it will be nearly impossible for you to get her attention from within her jacket. An abrupt change in temperature indicates that you are now outside, in the warm sunshine. Your travelling companion suddenly comes to a stop, throwing you into the pile of gum wrappers again.

“There you are, you little bitch!” you hear an angry male voice shout. “Looks like you got detention for what you did to me in front of my friends. But that’s not the only punishment you’ll get today!”

Sounds like whoever she accosted during the schoolday has been waiting for her outside the school to seek some measure of revenge. This probably won’t turn out well.

“If you don’t want a black eye, then you shouldn’t be groping my friends,” the tomboy retorts. It sounds like she sticks up for her friends, a good sign. Plus, this explains why she was in detention today. You feel a little better about your choice of host now that you know she’s not a bully herself.

“Shut up! I’ll make you regret the day you messed with me!” he screams. A shuffling of feet ensues. It sounds like he’s charging her like an angry bull. However, your host doesn’t seem to make any effort to run away. Instead, the tomboy’s arm jerks forward and you hear a pop, followed by a shout of pain.

“You bitch! You broke my nose!” the bully yelps. It seems she felled him with a single punch. Guess that’s the second time today that she’s decked this guy. You wish you could glance out of the pocket to see who she just trounced, but you have a few guesses who it was based on his voice, and none of them are anyone you want to run into at full size, much less at your current shrunken height.

“You better get out of here before I break anything else,” the tomboy says. Another shuffling of feet indicates his retreat. You close your eyes and breathe a sigh of relief that this encounter didn’t end any worse than it did. As you open your eyes again, you see the light disappear as a massive hand enters the pocket! A crimson stain on the knuckles indicates that the tomboy broke open the skin on her hand again. As she shoves her throbbing hand into her pocket, you are pushed back into the cloth cavern by the massive wall of flesh. The blood oozing from her knuckles splashes all over you, and as it dries, it glues you to the material of the jacket. Pinned between the girl’s hand and the back wall of the pocket, the heat is unbearable. Your arms and legs are completely cemented to the pocket as the tomboy walks home. It ensures that you won’t fall out, but it’s going to be hard to break loose from this scabby prison. Now covered in sticky tomboy blood, you hear the jingling of keys as the tomboy unlocks her front door. You wiggle your arms and legs, but nothing breaks free. Like a dragon withdrawing from its cave, the tomboy’s hand departs, but are you stuck to the pocket or do you go flying out with her hand?
15311.title: Zipline

choices: Trust her and tell her the whole story
153112.content:
You're blinded by the sudden flash of sunlight, and you realize that you're stuck to the tomboy's hand. "Huh? That's weird." The tomboy says, looking at her hand. "Ugh. Bug stuck to my hand.." She says preparing to flick you away onto the ground. "Hey! Hey, wait! Please!" You yell out, hoping she hears. And it looks like she did. "The fuck? Did you just talk?" The tomboy asked as she got a closer look at you. Her eyes go wide. "Holy shit, you're a person!" She exclaimed in a shocked tone of voice. "Uh, yeah... I am..." You nervously reply. "What the hell..?" She said to herself as she gently pulled you off her scab and placed you in her palm. "Hold on, you're that guy from detention that just disappeared!" The tomboy says, getting a good look at you. "Yeah. Um, my name is Jack..." You explain as she contemplates what's going on. "Uh, I'm Bonnie. What the fuck happened to you, man?" Bonnie asks with a hint of concern in her voice. "I have no idea, honestly." You answer, still wary of the titanic tomboy who's hand you're in. "Um... Oh, hold on. We can't stay out here in public. Let's get back to my house first." Bonnie says, putting you back in her pocket.
After another minute or two of walking you hear house keys jingling and a door opening. Bonnie pulls you out of her pocket and puts you on the dining room table. "So, what happened to you?" She asks. "Like I said before, I have absolutely no clue..." You answer, trying to avoid eye contact because let's be honest. Bonnie's pretty intimidating. And she apparently noticed your timidness. "Alright, what was your name? Jack? You don't need to be afraid of me. I don't want to hurt you. I'm just trying to wrap my head around this whole thing, and if you want my help then you need to tell me what happened."
After a second of thinking you decide to...
153112.title: Stuck to her hand

choices: Take a much needed nap
Look around Bonnie's room
1531121.content:
You decide to trust Bonnie, seeing as you really don't have any other options. You tell her the entire story about how your ex girlfriend gave you a piece of candy and you're pretty sure that's what caused you to shrink. You then go on to tell Bonnie about how you decided she would be your best bet to get help.
"That, honestly is the weirdest story I've ever heard. But, then again, what else should I believe?" Bonnie chuckled, "But seriously, it kind of terrifies me to think about what she would've done to you if she had actually caught you... Now. Before we do anything, we should get you cleaned up." Bonnie said, seeing that you're covered with her blood.
She gently scoops you up and carries you to the kitchen sink. Bonnie tells you to take off your shirt and pants. "W-what?!" You protest, going red in the face (not that anyone could notice as your face was covered with blood). "Come on, man. You can keep your underwear on, I just need to clean you up." Bonnie says, her sudden change of tone scaring you a bit. You begrudgingly take off your shirt and pants, ready for the "bath" Bonnie intended to give you. The water was so nice and warm on your skin. Bonnie's fingers gently rubbing your body to remove any and all dried blood. "Aaaand... Done! That wasn't so bad, now was it?" Bonnie teased as she used a paper towel to dry you off. "Thank you, Bonnie..." you say as she sets you down on the kitchen counter. "Don't mention it." Bonnie said, giving you a small smile.
You were exhausted and Bonnie could tell. The tomboy looked down at you. "How about you get some rest. You look like you need it." You nod and step onto Bonnie's open hand. She carries you to her bedroom which at first glance anybody would mistake it for a boy's. A set of deer antlers on the wall, a hunting rifle leaned up in the corner of the room, a dart board hanging on her door, an old ball cap on the bed post, and a few other details. Bonnie set you down on her pillow. "There you go. Now get some rest, you need it." She says, pulling the blanket over your legs. "Thanks, Bonnie. I appreciate you helping me..." You say tiredly, resting your head on the -to you- swimming pool sized pillow. Bonnie smiles and leaves the room, giving you some privacy.
1531121.title: Trust her and tell her the whole story

choices: Get her attention down here.
Climb her leg.
Ascend the scarf.
1532.content:
You decide to place your bet on the girl in the scarf. Susie was a wild card, and that other girl looked just as likely to kick you across the room as help you out. So you set out across the cold floor, trying to cover as much ground as you can as quickly as you can. You can't afford to waste any time. If detention ends before you can get help, you're screwed.

Luckily, it doesn't take too long to reach the desk of the nerdy girl. Craning your neck, you look up at her. She seemed like a genuinely sweet girl from what you saw before, but now all you can see are her legs and that enormous scarf. Which brings up an important question. What do you do to get her attention? Do you try to attract her from the floor? For all you know, she won't hear a single word no matter how loudly you shout.

You could climb up her leg, although a single slip could send you to your death, and she could move her leg at any moment during that climb.

...Or there's her scarf. The knitted pattern would be easy to climb, and supposing it doesn't start to fall off while you're climbing, it might be your fastest route to get her attention. Hell, even if it does fall, you can probably catch her eye in the pile of scarf on the floor.

You weigh the options, and decide...
1532.title: Scarf Girl

choices: You notice the girl looking down at you.
The bell rings.
15323.content:
You decide climbing the scarf is your best bet. It's the most direct route up, and it's the closest to you. You can't afford to waste any time. So you step up to the scarf, looking up at the colorful ladder to discovery. You take a deep breath and take hold of it, starting up.

It's a surprisingly easy climb. The way the scarf is knitted, it's like climbing a really easy rock wall. You're grateful that some part of this is going to be easy. It feels like just about everything about getting people's attention at this size is ludicrously difficult and usually dangerous. Not that you've had much experience, but you just get the feeling.

You shake the strange thought from your head, focusing on climbing. You're about halfway, and look to the clock. You're really running short on time. Maybe ten more minutes, being generous. Maybe you haven't been climbing as fast as you thought you were.

Trying to make up for it, you pick up the pace, practically throwing yourself up the scarf. But as you grab one hand-hold, it pulls free from the scarf, a loose tie, and you lose your grip. "No!"

You panic, falling, but managing to grab the scarf before you can hit the ground, gripping it for all you're worth and taking a few deep breaths, terrified. "Okay...take it easy, Jack...you've got this."

When you can shake off the scare and get yourself to move, you start climbing again. You make a good pace, but don't rush like last time, careful not to grab or step on the loose knot from before. Finally, you make it to the top, sitting on the scarf and taking a moment to catch your breath and stretch your arms.

Suddenly...
15323.title: Climbing the Scarf

choices: She felt something in her scarf.
You start to slip loose and slide downward.
153232.content:
You stretch your arms. That was a pretty intense climb. All things considered, you're lucky you could manage it. But you don't have time to think about that. You still have to get this girl's attention.

RING! RING!

You wince, your cursing silenced by the bell as it rings. You quickly turn, looking up at the girl. "Hey! Down here! Look at me!"

But she doesn't hear you. She looks too excited to be able to leave, an admittedly adorable smile coming across her face. Without looking down, she lifts the scarf. You're knocked over, laying on it like a hammock as it swings now. The girl swings the scarf around her neck, double-wrapping it with a practiced speed and dexterity.

You half expect to be thrown off as she swings the scarf, but you grab onto it, holding on as tightly as you can. You see her chin coming toward you and wince, closing your eyes and turning your head. But the scarf drops as it should, and casually wraps around her neck. You feeling the scarf tighten and wrap around again, holding you firmly to her soft, sweet-smelling skin.

You sigh. This isn't exactly what you had planned.

The girl stood, pulling on her backpack and looking at her phone. She had a text message from her mom:

'Sure, Emily. I'll be there to pick you up..'

Emily smiled. She wouldn't have to take the late bus. That was a relief. She casually walked toward the door, looking at the other two girls and the...where was that boy who came in? Did he leave while she wasn't looking?

"Where the hell'd he go?" Susie seemed just as confused as she was.

But it was none of her business, so she shrugged, leaving the room.

You were starting to sweat...This scarf was hot, and it didn't let much cool air in. Which was probably the point. But this was turning into a sauna. You hoped she wasn't going to be wearing it too much longer. Or that she'd loosen it or something.

As Emily walked the halls toward the exit...
153232.title: Wrapped Up

choices: Climb the outside of her pant leg.
Climb the inside.
Susie leans down to re-tie her shoe.
1533.content:
Susie ended up sitting directly in front of you, four rows ahead. You sigh as you begin the trek to the other end of the room, waiting all the while for your tiny body's pace to be your doom as the bell rings and they all leave. But Susie wouldn't just leave if you didn't get to her, would she? She seemed to be looking forward to meeting you. But then, no one seemed to have noticed your apparent absence yet. So who could say?

You decide not to think about it as you press forward, and after what seems like forever, you reach Susie's skate shoes. Looking up, you see her legs towering above you before they fold onto the chair at her knees, and not much else from this angle. Grabbing the shoe, you hoist yourself up and in another minute are sitting on top of her foot. The way you see it, you've got two options here.

You can try to climb the outside of her pants, where if you fall you fall to the hard classroom floor, and very possibly hurt yourself badly.

Or you can try to climb the inside, where you could draw her attention and she could swat you flat thinking you're a bug that crawled in there, but you'll have something to grab if you fall.

Either way, you don't have much time to decide. What will it be?
1533.title: Approaching Susie

choices: You hear the bell ring to end detention.
Susie's hand comes down to scratch her leg.
15332.content:
The thought of your body broken on the floor flashes through your mind and a chill runs up your spine. You can't bring yourself to risk that fall, so for better or worse, you decide to climb the inside of Susie's pants. Hoisting yourself up, you grab hold of them and pull yourself inside, climbing at a pretty decent pace. But with one wrong grab, your hand slips and you flail, the pants folding and knocking you against her leg. You freeze as her leg moves, but she just stretches it out, probably leaning back in her seat.

You breathe a sigh of relief. But now unless you climb around to the bottom and risk tumbling out and to the floor, you're going to be touching her leg. She could swat at you any time...but she doesn't seem to have noticed you yet. So maybe you can just climb her and speed up this process.

Taking a chance, you let yourself lay on her leg, carefully rolling over and crawling up a little way. You pause to see if she'll react, but she doesn't move at all. Maybe she fell asleep? Either way, you don't have time to think about it. You've got to get her attention before detention ends and she stands up. Climbing as fast as you dare, you make it to her knee pretty quickly. Feeling confident, you stand, starting to walk along the top of her leg.

But around what feels like the halfway point...
15332.title: Getting into Susie's Pants

choices: Try to climb her hip.
Continue onward to her butt.
153322.content:
You freeze again as you feel Susie adjust herself in her seat, tottering a little as her leg moves, but keeping your balance, when suddenly her pants start to cave in behind you and push forward. You curse. Susie's scratching an itch. And it looks like that itch is you. Before you have time to prepare, her fingers slam into you, knocking you off balance and over the side of her leg. You tumble over, hitting the side of her pants and rolling to the outer side of her leg. There goes your easy route...

Sighing, you try to climb the side of the pajama pants, but they fold and you fall against the side of her leg, too tall and too curvy to let you climb it easily. Looks like you're not getting back up. You've only got one path left. Onward this way.

Carefully working your way down the dark, warm path you try not to stumble over folds and deal with the pants moving with your steps while trying not to touch Susie too much and draw her hand back. Not to mention as you get closer to her hips, her pants hold her tighter and tighter giving you less room to move freely in.

But after what feels like entirely too much time, you make it to her hip, seeing it curve off a little beyond you and above you. You 're practically being pressed into it, and you have a choice now. Either you can use the tightness of her pants here to try to scale her hip, or you can continue around to her butt and risk climbing her underwear. It would probably provide a better climbing surface and be faster, but if you do draw her attention there, it would be difficult to explain. And you do risk getting...stuck, for lack of a better word, if something should go amiss.

What do you decide?
153322.title: Knocked Off-course

choices: The bell. Detention's over. Oh no...
Susie trying to get more comfortable in her seat.
1533222.content:
It's definitely the riskier route, but you're short on time, and you've got a lot of Susie left to climb. You can't afford to fool around trying to make it up her hip. Steeling yourself, you continue around her hip, waiting for the wall that is her skin to be covered by something more. But when you're around the bend, you look forward and see...more skin. It curves on a bit further, but there are no panties. At least as far as you can see.

You furrow your brow. Maybe they're just a little further on. It's dark. You can't see very well. Carrying on, you press forward until you reach the end of her cheek, frowning when you see what you were hoping not to. A thong.

You sigh. This just got about three times more dangerous, but you don't have time to go back now. You take a deep breath, try to relax and carefully step toward it, careful not to touch her on either side. The smell here was...not as bad as you might have expected. Thanks for small blessings, you guess. But as you wrap your hands around the meager black thong, you get flashbacks to gym class. Trying to climb those god awful ropes and admittedly watching a more attractive girl or two from below when they did. Kind of ironic now.

But this was no time to get lost in thought. You carefully hoist yourself up, pressing your legs to either side of it and trying not to press on Susie too much, lest she find you here. You start your ascent, moving at a pretty reasonable pace. Her cheeks close in around you a bit about half way up, and for a few moments, you think you're not going to be able to keep going. But with a strong pull, you manage to get free and continue onward, pacing yourself and remaining as calm as you can.

About three quarters of the way up, you're startled by...
1533222.title: To her Butt

choices: She does.
Your cries are drowned out by the bell.
15332222.content:
Suddenly, Susie starts to move again. You freeze instinctively as your world suddenly starts to rise, and then abruptly to fall. You hold on tight, but as Susie hits the seat again, you are propelled twice your height's distance down and receive a nasty case of rope burn. You wince and foolishly let go of the thong, but immediately regret it as you fall backward and her cheeks slap into you from either side, settling back into place. You try to worm your way back, but you are held tightly in place. And Susie's not done yet. She grinds her butt into the chair a little, smooshing you from either side each time she adjusts. You can't take any more of this.

Susie smiles as she finally finds a comfortable position to sit, looking at the clock. Just one minute left now... She wondered how the new kid was holding up. She wasn't sure what it was about him, but she was looking forward to see him again. She looked back to smile at him and point at the clock, but frowned when she didn't see him. What the hell? Where did he go...?

You panic. You're trapped in Susie's crack, you can't move, and detention is going to end any second. Right now, you don't care if Susie finds you here so long as you don't get stuck here when she gets up and starts to walk. You begin to shout.

"Susie! Susie, help me!"

Does she hear you?
15332222.title: Getting Comfy

choices: is laughing, but wants to help.
has a mischievous grin on her face.
153322221.content:
Susie freezes when she hears the words. Was that...did a voice just come out of her butt? She is immediately very careful, listening in case she's imagining things.

"-elp me! Su-!"

The bell rings and cuts off the voice. But she definitely heard that. There was something or someone in her butt, and it was asking for help. "This day just gets weirder and weirder..."

She looks back at the empty seat where the boy was. Was it him?...No, that's crazy. She shook her head, standing up. But she was about to find out whatever it was back there. Nodding to herself, she walked out the door of the detention room quickly, heading to the nearest bathroom. She swung into the closest stall, slammed the lock shut and carefully pulled down her pants to have a look at just was was nestled between her cheeks.

As you heard the bell, you cursed. You were screwed. Susie stood up and her butt, formerly spread a bit by the chair, collapsed in on you, engulfing your tiny body. You could breathe, but if you couldn't move before, you were completely paralyzed now. Then she started to walk. Her left cheek rubbed along your body, turning your legs down and flipping you vertically. Then her right rubbed back, rolling you along deeper into her crack. She seemed to be in a hurry, and you were granted no mercy. With each step, you were rolled back and forth, back and forth between her, at least, pillowy soft cheeks. Finally, you were slammed into her thong and you grabbed hold while you could, preventing you from being rolled any more, but still being ground on with each step. Finally, it comes to an end, and you feel a little light shining on you, about as much as her butt allows to reach you.

Susie spreads her cheeks slowly, craning her neck to see what was trapped there. What she saw answered two questions, but confused her more. This was where the quiet boy went, and this was what was in her butt. But...how? Why?

As her cheeks spread, you looked up in amazement. Had she really heard you? The hand coming back and grabbing you said yes as you were plucked from your awkward position wrapped around her thong and brought up to her face.

"Kid? I've got two questions. One. How did you get so tiny? Two. What are you doing buried in my ass hugging my unmentionables?

You just stare at her for a second, just glad to be free. Then snap out out of it. "Alright. This is gonna be kind of a long story..."

Susie pulls up her pants with her free hand and sits down on the toilet, setting you on her palm. "I've got time."

You take a deep breath, sitting on her palm. "Alright... it all started just after school. I was on my way to detention..."

You tell her the whole story, trying to explain all your reasoning and make it very clear you weren't doing anything pervy in her pants.

As you finish your story, you look up at her to gauge her reaction. Susie...
153322221.title: Cry for Help Heard

choices: Pulls open the already loose collar of her shirt, dangling you in front of her.
Pulls her pants back down, bringing you toward part of her all too familiar.
1533222212.content:
As you finish up your story, trying to explain as best you can that your intentions were entirely pure, you look up at Susie to gauge her reaction. What you see...might be a good reaction?

Susie is grinning down at your tiny form, laughing a little bit. "So, let me just get this right. Three girls in the room, you chose the drop-dead gorgeous senior that flirted with you, decided to climb the inside of her pants instead of the outside, 'fell' " She motions air quotes with her free hand. "off the top of her leg, and were left with the option of scoping her ass and climbing right up the middle, letting go and getting trapped there...and at no point were you thinking a single dirty thought?"

You open your mouth to retort, but pause. It's...hard to argue against it when you phrase it that way. "Well...well, you see-"

"Save it, cutie. I'd be disappointed if there weren't a dozen fantasies running through your little head through it all." Susie looks off to the side as if she were daydreaming. "Wondering what it would be like to be smothered in the gorgeous butt of that stunning girl with no respect for the system. And oh, if she found you! What would she think? What would she dooo...?" She practically coos that last word, looking back at you as she does.

info.brief_description: What happens when you shrink one day in your high school?
info.description:
News

To those who haven't noticed, I've been away some time. I haven't updated or personally added chapters in a while, and I don't know that I'll ever return to regular additions simply due to the business of everyday life these days. I will still keep an eye on things and edit or remove chapters as I see fit, and I'm sure I'll write a few more chapters before my time with this piece is fully done, but I won't promise much more than that.

I still love this story. I've loved watching it grow, watching new writers so enthused that they add their own touch and every time I open this site and see that "New Chapter" message in my mailbox, it makes me smile. This story started for me, and at the end of the day, but at the end of the day, it's equally as much for all of you. The weirdly huge, erotic macrophile community of Writing. com that's risen and fallen and risen again while I've stood aside and watched. To those who inspired me, those who've moved on, and those who've arrived and caught my eye with their own works.

This one's still for you.

Anyway, storywise...

You are Jack. A typical high schooler. Suddenly <insert gasp here> You are shrunk! What will happen? Let's find out.

The Important Characters, as they stand:

Jack: This is you. You're an average high school every man with a knack for making cool friends. No story required.
Samantha: Jack's crush. He's afraid to talk to her most of the time.
Amy: Samantha's friend. She's a little eccentric.
Courtney: Another friend of Samantha's. She's quiet and a bit strange, but you know her.
Lee: A friend of Amy's. She hates your guts.
Emma: Jack's best friend. She's a year older and loves to mess with him.
Claire: Rich bitch. She hates Emma, and by extension, she's not too fond of you.
Kelly: A girl in Jack's class. He likes her, but not in a special way.
Ashley: A girl in Jack's gym class, who gets way too into certain sports. She's a bit odd.
Meg: Samantha's friend. You don't know much about her.
Kayla: A goth junior. You think she's cool, but you don't really know her.
Alina: A goth girl in one of your classes. You're not sure what grade she's in. Easily irritated.
Tuesday: A friend of Alina's. A bubbly goth girl with a bubblier butt. Flirts as a self-defense mechanism, and also for fun.
Ariel: Your feminist ex-girlfriend, who was always obsessed with female empowerment even when you were dating her in eighth grade. That was a long time ago, and she has probably gotten over it... right?
Marie: A new girl who just transferred to the school. Naturally, you don't know her very well yet.
Miki: A Japanese-Korean girl with an overly sensitive rear.
Suzie: A bad girl, but not a bully. Suzie wants to have a good time, and she's never let rules get in the way of itm

Blair: Leader of the Sirens, the scariest bad girls in school. Once made a boy kiss her ass until he passed out.
Zoe: The gentlest of the Sirens, at least in Jack's experience. She has a massive crush on him.
Tanya: The cruelest and most imaginative of the Sirens. Not afraid to be thought of as disgusting to make someone's life hell.
Viv: Tanya's older sister. A horndog with a special secret and a love for toys.

Ms. Green: Jack's bottom-heavy english teacher, on whom he has a schoolboy crush.
Ms. Deboodt: A frighteningly strict teacher with the body and demeanor of a dominatrix, and stories to match.
Nurse Erin: The school nurse. You've never really had to visit her, but she seems more mischievous than helpful.
Dolores Taylor: A busty lunch lady looking for something to liven up her day.

Rules for Adding

I'm not a huge stickler about content, but I've had a few problems with writing quality in submitted chapters. So here are a few guidelines if you're going to add.

1. Chapters must use clear English. Avoid run-on sentences, use punctuation and capitalization. All that good stuff.
2. Chapters must be broken into paragraphs. If it's short enough to be just one paragraph, it's probably too short to be a full chapter.
3. Stick to a second-person narrative as much as possible.
4. NO CHOICE CHAPTERS. There were some early on, but we're all better than that. I'm willing to bend on this if you write one of the follow-ups immediately, but a choice chapter with no content is a waste and will be deleted.

That's pretty much it. Little errors are no issue and can be fixed, but chapters that don't meet a certain standard are likely to be deleted. I will always message you about this if and when it happens.

Thanks to Arach, Lunablade, Steamgear, Neon, Joe Random, eggman, Odysseus, Alina, Jonny, zikade, WritingGirl, Robby, mcgiante, ShrunkenElf, Hparry, DRAGO, PenHandleUnknown14, Da Boss, and many others for their additions!
